p: Of the 27 inferred clusters, 84 (85.71%), 7 (7.14%), and 6 (6.12%) included individuals sampled in Guangdong, Hebei, and Shanghai. Notably, 19 (70.37%) and 3 (11.11%) of 27 clusters were comprised of individuals from only Guangdong and Hebei, respectively. 5 (18.52%) of 27 clusters included sequences from two provinces: 4 clusters included sequences from Guangdong and Shanghai, and 1 from Guangdong and Hebei (Fig. 2; Supplementary Table S2 and S3).
